General_Description: '''Recruitment Drive''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra came across [[Xenia]]'s [[Xenia's Steward|steward]], who requested her display [[Keos]] colors and destroy vessels as a warning to any who would oppose Xenia.
Section_Dialogue:
While in [[Koressia]], Kassandra came across a one-eyed [[Piracy|pirate]], who was fixing a broken [[ship]]. *'''Steward:''' ''Sails need repair. Three broken oars on the top level. Two on the second level. Cracked spar.
Never a day's rest, by [[Jupiter|Zeus]]...'' Kassandra approached the pirate. *'''Steward:''' ''What do you need?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Is this a bad time?'' *'''Steward:''' ''Every time's a bad time. There's too much work and not enough people to do it. But I'm the only person who cares about that. Wait. Did Xenia sent you?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''She said you'd have work for me.'' *'''Steward:''' ''Well thank [[Poseidon]]. Finally! Someone competent to help!
Ships are pushing into our territory and test us. Xenia wants to send a message to make sure people understand who owns this little part of the [[Aegean Sea|Aegean]].'' |-|Accept – I'll help you.= "What kind of message?" *'''Kassandra:''' ''What kind of message do you want to send?'' *'''Steward:''' ''Sinking some ships while flying her colors should do the trick.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That's one way to do it.'' *'''Steward:''' ''We're still pirates. We've got a reputation to uphold in these waters, and nothing says, "respect me" like a bit of blood spilling.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Sounds to me like you're weakening the competition. Keos not big enough for your ambitions?'' *'''Steward:''' ''If we were going to take more territory we wouldn't be hiring the [[Mercenary|likes]] of you. We'd do it ourselves. Best way to prevent an attack is to strike first.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''No arguments here.'' |-|I'm not interested.= (Return to first dialogue option) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll sink the ships for you. What am I targeting?'' *'''Steward:''' ''Destroy a few ships from [[Sparta]], a few from [[Athens]], and a few bandit ones, too.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That's a lot of ship sinking.'' *'''Steward:''' ''Just make sure you're flying Xenia's colors when you do the sinking. I'll pay you well to ensure the message is understood.'' Kassandra headed to the ''[[Adrestia]]'' and donned the colors of Keos. She set out and eliminated 2 ships belonging to each group: the Athenians, the Spartans, and the bandits. After doing so, she returned to the steward. *'''Steward:''' ''Yes?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I've sunk the ships.'' *'''Steward:''' ''I knew I liked you. Xenia will be pleased that her waters are back under her control.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Flattery is fine, but I'm here for the bounty.'' *'''Steward:''' ''Of course.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra donned the colors of Xenia's pirates and sank a handful of ships belonging to all major naval powers, sending the message Xenia hoped to convey.
